name: a day at the hot springs
name_original: a day at the hot springs
description:
Help a socially anxious Germany pluck up the courage to confess to Japan on his trip to the hot springs.

FEATURES
-Multiple endings!
-Cute art!
-A budding romance!
-A hint system to get the best ending!
-A blushing Germany!
-Girlboss Japan!

AND MORE!

INFORMATION Do not copy or claim these images as your own. (I made these myself!) These were made specially for this game jam. ZIP file contains fake screenshots (AKA just images) of what could've been.

Coming to you soon at..
